name: Shriekbat
description: The Shriekbat is a huge monstrosity with impressive combat capabilities and sound-based attacks. It has a powerful bite and talons, along with a unique shriek ability that can stun and damage foes.
memorable: Notable for its devastating sound attacks and grappling talons, as well as an impressive strength score.
goals: Ambush prey and dominate the battlefield using sound-based attacks.
relations: May be found in the company of other monstrous creatures or in areas with abundant prey.
environment: Typically found in dark caverns or locations with ample flying space.
strengths: Excels in melee damage and area-of-effect sound attacks, immune to thunder damage.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma, which limits its strategic capabilities.
attacks: Makes two attacks per turn: a powerful bite for piercing damage and grappling talons for slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Shriek ability emits a devastating cone of sound that can deal extensive damage and stun enemies.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense surroundings unless deafened.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, making it capable of ambushing unsuspecting prey.
additional_information: Can grapple targets with talons, restraining them.
Uses echolocation as a means of perception.
Deals significant area damage with a risk of stunning.
test_queries: huge flying monster that screams loud
creature that grapples with talons and shrieks
ambush predator immune to thunder damage
primal beast that attacks with sound
